Charles-Auguste Bontemps (Febụwarị 9, 1893 Ọktoba 14, 1981) bụ onye France na-eme ngagharị iwe, onye na-eme udo, onye na'iche echiche n'onwe ya na onye na-ahụ maka ọdịdị na onye edemede.

A mụrụ Bontemps n'ọnwa Febụwarị 9, afọ 1893, na ngalaba Nièvre nke mba France. O jikọtara aka na mbipụta anarchist Ce qu'il faut dire nke Sébastien Faure duziri. Mgbe ọ sonyechara na French Communist Party n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe October Revolution na-aga n'ihu, ọ sonyeere otu ndị na-emegide agha "Ligue Internationale des Réfractaires à la guerre"
N'oge Agha Obodo Spain ọ sonyeere "Solidarité Internationale Antifasciste".

Ọ bụ onye dị mkpa na ntọala nke French Anarchist Federation. Bontemps na Maurice Joyeux dere ụkpụrụ ntọala ọhụrụ nke French Anarchist Federation nke guzobere nzukọ nwere ọtụtụ ọchịchọ na nnwere onwe nke otu ndị a haziri gburugburu ụkpụrụ synthesist. O sonyekwara na ntọala nke French Anarchist Federation n'afọ 1953. N'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1967, Bontemps, n'akụkụ Maurice Joyeux na Guy Bodson na akwụkwọ akụkọ Anarchist Federation ́s Le Monde libertaire, na ndị otu Situationist International gụnyere Guy Debord nwere nkatọ.

Ọ bụ onye edemede na-edepụta ihe karịsịa na isiokwu nke ọgba aghara, echiche onwe, nkwado udo na Anarcho-naturism. Echiche ya banyere ọgba aghara dabeere na echiche ya nke "Social Individualism" nke o dere nke ọma
Ọ gbachitere echiche anarchist nke dabeere na "nchịkọta nke ihe na onye ọ bụla nke ndị mmadụ".
[Ihe e dere n'ala ala peeji] [CCFR, CP, IIHS]
